definitions.text: a person who backs a politician or a team etc.
examples: all their supporters came out for the game
they are friends of the library

definitions.text: someone who supports or champions something
a person who contributes to the fulfillment of a need or furtherance of an effort or purpose
examples: they hired additional help to finish the work

definitions.text: a band (usually elastic) worn around the leg to hold up a stocking (or around the arm to hold up a sleeve)
a support for the genitals worn by men engaging in strenuous exercise
